Comment:
GNATcheck allows implementing and verifying \
a coding standard.

GNATcheck allows implementing and verifying \
a coding style guide.

GNATcheck can forbid the use of dynamic \
objects.

GNATcheck can forbid the use of dynamic \
variables.

GNATcheck can forbid the use of \
pointers or force justification of their usage.

GNATcheck can forbid the use of \
recursion or force justification of their usage.

GNATcheck can forbid the use of \
unconditional jumps.

GNATmetric can compute complexity measures, and \
GNATcheck can report excessive complexity.
GNATcheck can verify rules related to exit points.

GNATcheck can limit \
the number of parameters for subroutines and report when that number is \
exceeded.

GNATcheck can flag global \
variable usage and enforce their justification. SPARK forbids function \
side effects and enforces documentation and verification of uses of global \
variables. GNAT Studio allows analyzing usage of global variables.
